message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's worth a lot to me, so I'm starting with a price of $12,000.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints.  Let's meet in the middle. How about $10,500? That's still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. How about $9,800? That's the most I can afford.
Bob, I'm really close to selling this to someone else, but I'm still willing to work with you. How about $10,200? This is my final offer. If you can't meet me there, I'll have to move on.
I understand you're close to selling it to someone else, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $9,900. That's the lowest I can go.
